doc.summary: Gets tests whether a dynamic datapack is enabled.
doc.text: Gets tests whether a dynamic datapack is enabled.

doc.summary: This allows you to have multiple datapacks in your mod file.
doc.text:
This allows you to have multiple datapacks in your mod file. While the main one is always loaded, you can load the other ones via DynamicDatapacks#enablePack(String, String). This should be called in your mods constructor.
A dynamic datapack must be located in libxdata/[name] inside your JAR file where [name] is the name of your dynamic datapack. Inside this folder you can put the content that normally is in the
data folder. A pack.mcmeta file is not required and if you provide one it'll be ignored.
